description: Try our easy to follow Bbq Moroccan Squid With Coriander recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: BBQ squid,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Egg free,Seafood,Low sugar,High protein,Christmas,Soy free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Bbq Moroccan Squid With Coriander Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cut through 1 side of each squid tube lengthways. Open out flat with inside surface facing up and score diagonally 2cm apart. Pat dry with paper towel. Slice into large triangular pieces.
Combine oil, garlic, pepper, coriander and turmeric in a bowl. Add squid and set aside for 20 minutes to marinate.
Preheat a barbecue or a chargrill pan over medium-high heat. Cook squid for 3 minutes each side. Serve with lemon slices and fresh coriander.
